About Me

I am Shwetha.I am a Quality Assurance Engineer having over 8 years of experience in the Software Testing industry. I have worked for Service based companies and Start-ups under Finance,Banking and Music Domain.I have also worked as a SCRUM Master in my earlier engagements. As a tester, I always looked for multiple ways to break the Software code.Recently I developed interests in Web Development and I am getting to know the constructive side of it. From a personal perspective I am an optimistic person who believes that all things happen for a reason.My interests are baking,cooking,hiking,gaming,yoga,sketching,knitting,dancing and many many more.I am an avid traveller, food lover and a fitness enthusiast. I am a mother to a 9 year old boy with whom I spend most of my time.

Experience and Technical Expertise

Quality Assurance (QA) Analyst with over 8+ years of experience in the IT industry spanning across functional testing, data warehousing (extract-transform-load), web and mobile application testing across the Music, Banking and Financial domains. Stints at Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) and startups like mSangeet have provided me with a holistic view and hands-on experience on automation and manual testing on Mobile and Standalone applications across all stages of product development lifecycle including Waterfall and Scrum methodologies. I have worked on the following tools such as Selenium WebDriver, TestNg, Git, GitHub, Postman, TestRail, Quality Center/ALM, Jira, MS Visio , MySQL Workbench, Control M , Tivoli, Terradata,Informatica, HP ALM Quality Center, Jira, Browser Stack,Visual Studio,Eclipse.Proogramming languages known are Java,SQL ,Javascript,HTML and CSS.

Roles and Responsibilities

● Extensive knowledge of QA methodology like Agile and Waterfall. Involved in analyzing the requirements document to formulate the test cases and conducted manual testing and automation testing for the entire application. ● ISTQB certified. ● Expertise in Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC). ● Skilled in understanding and developing Business requirements, designed documents, Test Plan and STLC using tools such as Visio. ● Working experience in SCRUM management, leading QA team, conducting daily standup meetings. ● Extensive knowledge of QA methodology like Agile and Waterfall. ● Proficient in Manual Testing and Automation Testing ● Good expertise in Banking and Financial Domain(Credit Card Services and Investment Banking) ● Working knowledge in Java Selenium Webdriver , running automation test using Testng. ● Extensively used automated tool QTP for Regression Testing ● Proficient in using Github and Github commands. ● Expert in writing defect and using defect tracking tool such as JIRA,ALM and Bugzilla.

Education and Certifications

Bachelor of Engineering in Information Science. International Board of Software Testing certification(ISTQB)Foundation+Advance Agile and SCRUM Fundamentals certification.
